title: Bug 109718 - Tips Displaying Large Content in One Line
description: When saving and placing the mouse pointer on a text item containing large content, the tips are displayed in a single line. This behavior is not in line with the expected result.
OB: When saving and hovering the mouse over the text item with large content, the tips are displayed as a single line.
EB: The expected behavior is that the tips should be displayed in the given format, not as a single line.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Save the document with a text item containing large content.
2. Place the mouse pointer over the text item.
